"nav-link active" : "text-dark text-decoration-none"; }; useEffect(() => { let userInLocalStorage = localStorage.getItem("id_token"); if (userInLocalStorage === null) { alert("You have to login first to access this page"); navigate("/login"); console.log(userInLocalStorage, "23244"); return; } }, []); const logout = () => { localStorage.removeItem("id_token"); navigate("/login"); }; return (
